name: Proof
body:
Proof
=====

Proof is a library of classes for creating object oriented applications in PHP.
Objects are king here and are treated as such.

Why?
----

Because PHP is a scripting language.


Usage
-----

To start using proof just copy the "proof" folder and "proof.php" file to your server route.
From there just include the "proof.php" file and your on your way.


Contribute
----------

See the TODO file.
